name: BRD
description: BRD is an ecological public chain integrating social, GameFi and metaverse application ecology. Its mission is to provide support for the existing metaverse and actively build a fair public, decentralized, entertaining and innovative web3.0 era. BRD is a meta-universe public chain jointly initiated by multiple international communities to form a team. BRD is not managed by any single individual or company, and no one can make rules for the BRD meta-universe alone. It is committed to realizing decentralized ecological governance in a sense.
